thread.title: Take two: Sundance Film Festival will try again to sell passes
thread.title_full: Take two: Sundance Film Festival will try again to sell passes

title: Take two: Sundance Film Festival will try again to sell passes
text: By SEAN P. MEANS | The Salt Lake Tribune First Published 7 minutes ago â€¢ Updated 7 minutes ago Sundance festivalgoer Zane Miyamoto, of Los Angeles, talks on his cell phone next to posters advertising festival films during day two of the 2015 Sundance Film Festival on Friday, Jan. 22, 2015, in Park City, Utah. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP) Sundance festivalgoer Zane Miyamoto, of Los Angeles, talks on his cell phone next to posters advertising festival films during day two of the 2015 Sundance Film Festival on Friday, Jan. 22, 2015, in Park City, Utah. (Photo by Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP) Share This Article ARTICLE PHOTO GALLERY (2) People wanting to buy ticket packages and passes for the 2016 Sundance Film Festival will get a second chance next week, 15 days after a website glitch forced Sundance officials to cut off sales the first time. The new sales date will be Thursday, Oct. 29, starting at noon Mountain time, festival organizers announced Friday. "After extensive investigation, development, and testing, we are pleased to relaunch sales in a robust and stable environment," a statement on the Sundance Institute's website said. "We are confident that our system will allow for a seamless experience." Ticket sales on Oct. 14 were shut down after 96 minutes, as many buyers received error messages when entering credit-card information. A few buyers were able to get their packages and passes, but most of the offerings are still available. VIDEOS Check out all the Trib TopJobs Passes and packages will be sold on a first-come, first-served basis. Festival organizers have posted a step-by-step guide to the process, as well as an FAQs list to answer questions. Individual tickets go on sale to Utah residents starting Jan. 14, to Sundance Institute members on Jan. 18, and to everyone else Jan. 19. The 2016 Sundance Film Festival runs Jan. 21-31 in Park City, and in venues in Salt Lake City, Ogden and the Sundance resort.
